title.rendered: List of All Betting Sites in Kenya

content.rendered:
After the recent purge on betting sites by the Kenyan government, the common assumption was that all betting sites had been closed down. This couldn’t be farther from the truth. As a matter of fact, betting and betting firms continue to run normally. The recent suspension of pay bill numbers was a result of license renewal and it affected a number of big betting companies such as Sportpesa and Betin.

Regardless, betting still continues normally in Kenya and I am going to give you a list of the best betting sites around. Some of these sites also happen to offer most popular spin and win games in the country.

1xbet.com

This site continues to attract high traffic because of its enticing offers. The number one attraction is the 200% registration bonus. If you sign up with 1XBET Kenya, your account is deposited with 200% of your initial deposit.

The process of depositing the cash is also fast an easy. You can use MPESA to make a deposit. Enter 290011 as the pay bill number. The money is deposited to your account instantly. The process of withdrawing your winnings is equally straight-forward.

There is also the Rafiki bonus. This is a 20% bonus offered each time you refer a friend to sign up to the site. As the saying goes, the more the merrier. The more people you get to sign up in the site, the bigger the bonus you will enjoy.

There is another bonus given to players who spend at least Ksh 10,000 in placing a bet. If the player loses the money, Ksh 10,000 is instantly deposited in the account. What a way to encourage players to invest and win more.

1XBET also offers daily jackpots for amounts as high as Ksh 200million. Thousands of players play the jackpot and the lucky ones win.

JengaCash.com

Crafted to entertain and make cash, JengaCash has brought new excitement in the betting world in Kenya. With only a few years in existence there are over 20 jackpot winners who have ripped big through the website. There is a welcome bonus to new players making it to grow very fast among the youths especially after the exit of other big players. Pushing its fame is the fact it also takes a few minutes between placing stake and winning. Payments are done instantly direct to registered phone number, there no minimal balance required to withdraw.  Take this chance and try your luck to make cash today.

Betika

Among the many betting sites in Kenya, Betika is the one that seems to be the people’s favorite. It has a number of interesting offers that customers find hard to resist. Among the many lucrative offers availed by this site include a cash back bonus. The cash back offers give the stake back to the gambler if only one team loses in a multi bet with odds above 8.00.

Odibets

This is another popular betting site that is known for both it’s heavily boosted odds on specific games and also their bonuses. For new members, you get a free bet on Odileague. This bet however expires if it goes unused after 7 days. Distinct from other betting sites Odibets refunds any transactional cost accrued while depositing money into your betting account. What makes this betting site stand out from the rest is the fact that the registration process is quite simple and also the fact that they give free days bundles on your first deposit of any cash amount which is over Ksh. 49. Their response team is also efficient and they handle customer complaints almost as soon as they are reported.

Mozzartbet

Mozzartbet is another betting site that is getting plenty of admiration because of its big odds and daily jackpot. This betting site allows gamblers to participate in jackpot competition on an almost daily basis. They select 13 games from which the winner of all those games gets to walk away with Ksh. 10,000,000. Getting 12 out of 13 games wins you Ksh. 100,000 while 8 out of 13 months gets you your cashback.

Shabiki.com

This is another betting site that is known for its numerous jackpot offers. It has both daily and weekly jackpots. Shabiki jackpot mbao is one of their jackpot competitions which has a total of 10 games and bonuses start from 6 correct predictions. Shabiki Power17 is another jackpot competition that has a total of 17 games. Correct prediction of all the 17 games sees the winner walk away with Ksh. 100,000,000. BonKshpower draw with a Ksh. 100 million payout and bonuses up for grabs.

Helabet.com

The site offers everything a bettor can look for in a betting site. Since its inception in 2015, the site continues to be the people’s best. Users can place bets on the site by maximizing on low stakes and high odds.

The site also provides forex trading platform providing another opportunity for users to make money. Virtual gaming options are also available here. The site mainly specializes in soccer, one of the world’s most popular sports. However, it is not limited to soccer alone as other sports like cricket are also available.

The site is also informative and people can get informative information regarding their best sports. This way, bettors are informed and can analyze their games of interest accordingly. The variety of events is also overwhelming with an average of 200 on weekdays and above 500 on weekends.

22bet.co.ke

This site brings to the table countless benefits that make it popular across Kenya. Sports lovers use the platform to make quick cash thanks to the competitive odds provided. The site also provides a variety of games to select from increasing the chances of winning.

There site has a jackpot as well. Bettors can select multiple jackpot games and stand a chance to win big. The jackpot prizes vary but, they do not drop to less than a million

Sportybet.com

This is a fairly new site that is highly competitive. The odds provided are among the highest compared to other sites. Bettors also stand a chance to enjoy gifts of upto Ksh 1000 on the initial deposit. If you make an initial deposit of Ksh 300, you get a cash gift of Ksh 1000.

Powerbets.com

Powerbets Kenya was introduced in Kenya in 2016. Through its website, bettors can select various sports from different leagues.

The unique feature about this site is that it allows players to use bitcoin currency. It also allows for the use of other mobile money applications such as Airtel money and Mpesa. This flexibility has made it a people’s favorite.

There is a welcome bonus voucher of Ksh.50 for new users. However, the voucher can only be used to place a pre-match bet for games that are on the promotional page. It expires after 3 days giving bettors ample time to maximize on the bonus. Subscribers can also enjoy a 30% multi-bet bonus.

Live betting is available on the site and players can place bets on ongoing live games. Live bets are a rare function in other bitcoin enabled betting sites.

Betpawa.com

The site is owned by Gaming international and is by far the most user friendly. Additionally, the site makes it easy for players to spot the best matches by highlighting them. Users also love it because the stakes are low. You can place a bet with as little as one shilling. Additionally

The site is also light and loads fast on all devices even for in-play/live bets. You can, therefore, bet at your convenience.

Premierbet.com

The site is an attraction to users thanks to its elaborate and color filled features. It offers bettors an array of games from all leagues across the world. Besides, it provides convenience by offering instant money depositing and withdrawing options.

Safaribets.com

Talk of convenience and variety, this site offers it all. It is a popular bookie that allows users to place live bets and pre-match bets. The odds are also decent and many site users have been lucky enough to enjoy some winnings.

Supabet247.com

The site comes with irresistible features that Kenyan bettors cannot keep away from. Bettors are spoilt for choice thanks to the variety of game options provided in the site. It is up to the player to make the best selection.

Bettors also have an option to bet online and offline. There is also an option of SMS betting. Since almost every Kenyan has a mobile phone set, it allows for users from all walks of life to place their bets.

Betyetu.com

This site is renowned for its user friendliness, a quality that bettors yearn for. You can easily navigate through the sites and select the games of choice using appropriate filters. There is also great variety of sports and you can never miss what you are looking for.

Dafabet.co.ke

The site provides betting lovers with an international appeal. It enables the continuous streaming of live and recorded sports. Additionally, bettors can place live bets and bet when offline as well. The site also offers various sports options that different users enjoy.

Eazibet.co.ke

The superior element that makes this site well known is the jackpot. It is comprised of 6 selections that are chosen by Neil Andrews, a renowned sports legend. The weekly jackpot prize is Ksh 250,000 not to mention bonuses of Ksh 10,000.

The site also facilitates live betting for soccer. Soccer is the main sport of focus. The presentation of the games is elite giving gamers a user friendly experience.

Lucky2u.co.ke

The site has been in existence since 2010. They offer a great experience to sport lovers and anyone who visits the site keep coming back. The site provides game lovers with different sports from basketball and baseball to soccer. The options are unlimited.

Live betting is also enabled and people can bet on ongoing sports.

M-CHEZA.com

The site has grown tremendously to accommodate the need of the modern Kenya. At first, m-CHEZA was SMS based. Today, the site has embraced digital betting platforms as well. The features are attractive to bettors as they include virtual sports, casino and live betting.

Registering to the site is absolutely free. There is also an invite bonus that is given to new users. Users can also invite friends from the site and get a bonus on the first 3 bets placed.

The features are also appealing to users and they enjoy a secure, entertaining and dependable platform.

Chezacash.com

The site is an excellent platform for all sorts of betters. If you like pre-match bets or live betting, the site is an excellent choice. The odds are competitive and bettors earn high returns. Their website features are also worth mentioning. There are thousands of games that are available and you can use the filters to select the best combinations to earn you cash.

Elitebet.com

As the name suggests, Elitebet provides nothing but the best services in the betting industry. The site is one of the pioneers is the industry. It accommodates various mobile money option in Kenya making it easy for people to deposit and withdraw cash.

The betting options are also extensive. There are also many games and users can select as many combinations as possible.

Saharagames.com

The site is unique as it focuses on interacting with bettors. The company has opened shops in various areas in Kenya. In the site you will find the contacts and location of the shops. The site also provides information regarding the betting options available.

Bettors can play spin and win games of choice. There is also a jackpot that people can play and win up to millions of shillings. New registered users also receive a free bet bonus upon registration.

Betway.com

The site provides the finest online sports betting services. It combines local and international sports giving bettors immense options. The odds also lure bettors to place higher stakes as the potential returns are higher than those in some other betting sites.

Bettors can also stream live games and witness the action as it unfolds.

Kwikbet.com

The site is among the best beyond reasonable doubt. It has attractive offers including a daily jackpot. It comprises of 7 selections and the stake is Ksh 30 only. This is a low stake compared to the millions a bettor could potentially win. Having a daily winner keeps the traffic to the site flowing.

The range of sports is also attractive. Site users can select games belonging to their favorite sports and others too.

Additionally, the selection of 7 games puts the site at a better position. Other gaming sites jackpots comprise of a selection of 12 games and above.

Betraha.com

This website provides customers with memorable experiences. The betting market combinations are vast and users can maximize on getting high odds. There are also bonuses offered that keep customers coming back to the site.

Betlion.com

The site gives bettors all they want to have from fast payouts to bonuses. Upon opening an account, a registered user earns a free bet of Ksh 20. On top of the welcome bonus, there is the loyalty bonus. Earning the bonus requires a bettor to be loyal and place bets with 2 odds and above more than 5 times weekly. The bonus can go as high as Ksh 500.

Users can also earn a free bet of Ksh 100 for referring a friend to sign up. Additionally, you get a bet refund on a multi-bet if you lose by a single game. There is the cash out option and a 30% bet boost of the odd value.

The site also covers extensive markets including football, rugby, baseball, basketball and other sports. The jackpots also attract many bettors as the final winnings are lucrative. Besides, the site provides tips or predictions to the jackpots to guide bettors.

The Goliath jackpot prize is Ksh 350 million. It is comprised of 20 games and 3 reserve games. The 3 games are used when any game in the jackpot list is postponed, abandoned or cancelled. The stake is Ksh. 100. The Midweek jackpot is comprised of 15 games and 3 reserve games. The stake is Ksh 50.

Betfair.com

Every aspect of this site is appealing. There are countless bonuses to be enjoyed from the site including welcome and referral bonuses. You can also opt for cash out to reduce the risk of a loss. Above all, the odds are relatively high ensuring the players high returns.

Bet365.com

This website is not only appealing but also convenient. The site loads readily and people can bet when online or offline. Bettors can also bet live and the odds can change up to the last minute. The bonuses are thrilling and so are the odds. The low stakes are also attractive.

888sport.com

When you think of efficiency, think of 888sport website. Sports bettors are precise and this is what the site offers. The countless markets give players a chance to select the games they trust can earn them some cash. Also, various sports are featured and that accommodates lovers of various sports. That ensures high traffic to the site.

Unibet.com

The website provides the best of what bettors aspire to have. There are countless benefits of betting through this website including huge bonuses, high odds and quick payouts. If you win a bet, the money is deposited to your account instantly.

Would you like to know the highest betting jackpots in Kenya?
